Classes in com.meltmedia.cadmium.core.config used by com.meltmedia.cadmium.core.commands
ConfigManager
          This centralizes and manages how other classes read and write to properties files.
 

Classes in com.meltmedia.cadmium.core.config used by com.meltmedia.cadmium.core.config
ConfigurationClass
          Annotation to bind ConfigurationClasses in Guice.
ConfigurationListener
          An interface for any class that is interested in configuration updates for specific configuration types.
ConfigurationNotFoundException
           
ConfigurationParser
          An interface of a Configuration Parser that will be created for each configuration update.
ConfigurationParserClass
          Annotates a binding of the class of the implementation of the ConfigurationParser interface.
ConfigurationParserFactory
          Simplifies the logic of getting a new instance of ConfigurationParser from the Guice Injector.

ConfigurationParser
          An interface of a Configuration Parser that will be created for each configuration update.
PropertiesReader
          PropertiesReader Interface.
PropertiesWriter
          This implements the PropertiesWriter Interface.
